---
name: SDD ticket proposal
about: Propose a new SDD ticket for the backlog (`.sdd/backlog/tickets/open`)
labels: sdd-ticket
---

### Context

- Area of the system (agent graph / tools / prompts / SDD / eval / CLI / security / other):
- Related files (if known):
- Is this based on a real run report or `.sdd/issues.md` entry?

### Objective

One‑paragraph description of what this ticket should achieve.

### Rough Definition of Done

- [ ] …
- [ ] …
- [ ] …

Keep it concrete (behaviour, tests, docs), not just “improve things”.

### Suggested steps

If you already have a rough sequence of steps or sub‑tasks, list them here. It’s fine if they’re high‑level — the ticket itself will be refined via SDD.

### Risks / dependencies

Anything that might make this ticket tricky:

- security / safety implications,
- performance concerns,
- dependencies on other tickets or external APIs.
